content: उच्छ्वासः {@--1@} Breath, exhalation, breathing out; मुखोच्छ्वासगंधं <ls>V. 4. 22</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 3</ls>; <ls>Me. 102.</ls> {@--2@} Support of life, being alive; <ls>U. 3. 30</ls>; <ls>K. 158.</ls> {@--3@} A sigh. {@--4@} Consolation, encouragement; <ls>Amaru. 11.</ls> {@--5@} Expiring, dying. {@--6@} An air-hole. {@--7@} A division or chapter of a book, as of the Harṣa-charita; <ab>cf.</ab> अध्याय.
